section.section: The Department shall adopt regulations to implement the requirements of this subtitle.
The regulations may not preclude a nursing referral service agency from operating with independent contractors.

text.section:
The Department shall issue a 3-year license to a nursing referral service agency after the nursing referral service agency:
Completes an application for licensure; and
Pays a licensing fee of $1,000 to the Department.

A license shall expire on the third anniversary of its effective date unless:
The Department suspends or revokes the license; or
The license is renewed.
The Department may suspend or revoke a license issued under this section if the nursing referral service agency is operating in violation of the requirements of this subtitle.
